Headline: #126 Jackson buses Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division buses Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division, due to fire department activity near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division, due to fire department activity near Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.
